title: Dead But Dreaming - Muerta pero sonando (2013 - Bolivia) vampire
description:
Dead But Dreaming (2013 - Bolivia)                          Muerta pero soÃ±ando

Horror
 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt3029836/


Pachamama Films Production

A vampire film with "altitude." Winner of 9 awards in 2013 from the Beverly Hills Outlook! A mere synopsis can not properly convey the richness of the story told by Dead But Dreaming, a historically lush and mysteriously sexy vampire tale that literally spans centuries in its telling. It's hard to believe that such an ambitious project was accomplished so successfully on a shoestring budget, but here it is.

The year is 1805, the city of Nuestra SeÃ±ora de La Paz lives in fear of an invasion from the indigenous population, and, within its walls, a rebellion is brewing against the Spanish crown. If this were not enough, a beautiful vampire is terrorizing the population, leaving a bloodbath in her wake.
